record_data.record_plain_text:
EXHIBIT A TO SHARED FACILITIES AGREEMENT
Shared Facilities
The “Shared Facilities” shall consist of: (i) that certain Large Generator Interconnection Agreement as may be amended from time to time by and among GHI, PG&E, and the CAISO, dated as of August 19, 2014 and (ii) all of the “Interconnection Customer Interconnection Facilities” (as defined in the LGIA), except for the collection lines dedicated to the Golden Hills and Golden Hills North generating facilities.
record_data.filing_title: Golden Hills Interconnection SFA with Golden Hills, and Golden Hills North

record_data.record_title: GH Interconnection, Golden Hills, and Golden Hills North
record_data.filing_title: Golden Hills Interconnection SFA with Golden Hills, and Golden Hills North
